data.name: GetFreighterInfosBuiltByPlayer

data.name: InsertMorrigiRelicInfo
data.value: INSERT INTO encounters(type) VALUES("{0}"); INSERT INTO morrigi_relic (encounter_id,system_id, fleet_id, is_aggressive) VALUES (last_insert_rowid(),{1}, {2}, {3});

data.value: INSERT INTO design_modules (design_section_id, mount_node, module_id, weapon_id, station_module_type,design_id) VALUES ({0},"{1}",{2},{3},{4},{5}); SELECT last_insert_rowid();
